name: DWP Courier & Delivery Management
author: Drag WP

sections.description:
DWP Courier & Delivery Management is a delivery management wordpress plugins that you can use on any logistics website. Using this plugin, it’s easy to create delivery request, merchant account and maintain all the features. Merchant details are auto detectable. So, they need to fill out the delivery information only. All details can be found in the admin dashboard and process the delivery as well.

Features

Here are some features of this plugin:

  • Create Merchant Account
  • Merchant Account List
  • Delivery Request Submit
  • Delivery List & Management
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload dwp-courier-management.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use dashboard option to maintain delivery and moving services.
sections.faq:
Will this work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, this will work with any WordPress theme. Because, this will create admin dashboard only. It will not impact on frontend.

Will this impact on website loading speed?

We enqueued CSS and JS only for admin area. So, it will not impact
